name: Noodzy
overview: Noodzy is a free to use BETA web service that lets you perform major online networking functions through a single text bar. You are provided with a text bar in which you can type in # and a list of available commands is displayed. You can create an account on the service and then link your networking accounts to perform the available functions. For instance, you can easily add double tags to simultaneously update your Facebook and Twitter accounts. You can also enter your Gmail infos to easily check your inbox and send emails directly from the bar. You can also create your own custom tags and assign them a defined action or multiple actions to execute when typing the tag.
